name: Detective Laser
description:
-Controls-

W/S to go Forward and Back

Mouse to Look

E to Open Doors

Avoid disintegrating your coworkers!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fill the shoes of Detective Laser, a rugged gumshoe who just can't catch a break. Solve multiple puzzles! Experience the gripping tale! And finally discover the wonder of having an endless laser beam come out of your head.

Level Design, Lighting Design, and Gameplay Programming by  Zeke Levin

 Written and Art by Ethan Goldreyer

 Art and Narrative Programming by Kaylee Porter

Gameplay Design by Zeke Levin, Ethan Goldreyer, and Kaylee Porter
